custom-sql.sql: SELECT tbl_service.* FROM tbl_service WHERE (tbl_service.servicecode LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.servicename LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM tbl_service WHERE (tbl_service.servicecode LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.servicename LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (tbl_service.status LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM tbl_service_transaction
SELECT tbl_service_transaction.* FROM tbl_service_transaction WHERE tbl_service_transaction.transactioncode = ?
